Docs.summary: A Class representing an AttachedNetworkConnection along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct an from an instance of using the GetAttachedNetworkConnectionResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetAttachedNetworkConnection method.
